doc:
Knowl Johnson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knowl_Johnson 0 Knowl Johnson is an American actor born on September 16, 1970, in Greenwich, Connecticut, United States. He is known for his vocal work as Brother Bear in several of the Berenstain Bears television specials such as The Berenstain Bears' Easter Surprise (1981), The Berenstain Bears' Comic Valentine (1982), and The Berenstain Bears Play Ball (1983). Knowl_Johnson is an_American_actor born on September_16_,_1970 , in Greenwich , Connecticut , United_States . He is_known for his_vocal_work as Brother_Bear in several of the_Berenstain_Bears_television_specials such_as The_Berenstain_Bears '_Easter_Surprise ( 1981_) , The_Berenstain_Bears '_Comic_Valentine_(_1982_) , and The_Berenstain_Bears_Play_Ball_(_1983_) .
